Name: Super Foosball
About the game: Super Foosball is an arcade inspired Foosball game. First player to score 5 goals will win. The game contains both a single and multiplayer mode. Note: The game does NOT have matchmaking. You must forward port 7777 to play with your friend. Only the person hosting has to do this. Keyboard + Mouse Q W E R to select a pole Mouse movement to move poles Hold left or right click and scroll to rotate characters Scroll to kick the ball Keyboard only Q W E R to select pole Up / Down to move poles Left / Right to rotate characters Space to kick the ball This is a remake of an older game I created a few years ago. The previous game was a tech demo and I felt it deserved a bit of more polish. Music : Racing Cars by @SuperSonicDash
